data.actual_result: After a few clicks, the popup dissapears.
data.expected_result: As long as you hover over the popup, it should not dissapear, no matter how many times you click it.
data.short_description: Using the quick action Settings menu, some of the buttons to toggle between modes will dissapear after a few clients for no reason.
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click on the Gear Icon - Find the Appearance section - Keep clicking the Switch to X Mode
